revised_title: High-Resolution Numerical Solutions for Nonlinear Model Boltzmann Equations
tldr: The authors present a time-marching high-resolution finite difference method for solving the nonlinear model Boltzmann equations for rarefied gases. They use the discrete ordinate method to discretize the velocity space dependency of the distribution function and apply a high-order characteristics-based method to solve the resulting hyperbolic conservation laws. The method is tested for various rarefied gas flow problems, demonstrating its accuracy and efficiency.
